item.title: Alembic For The Database Schema Migrations
item.description: Using just sql scripts for managing database schema migrations is alright. But in that case we have to explicitly create a system where we have to keep track of the sequences of the scripts (one of the reasons: foreign key dependencies). While in development environment, if we want to check whether existing function/method code compatible with earlier table schema, we have to manually write some commands in our favorite db client.
